title: Concealed carry permits (CCW/CHL)
dataVerified: Permit holder name, DOB, photo, permit number, issuing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (active/expired/revoked). Link to issuing authority system (law enforcement only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake CCW permits. Domain binding verifies issuing authority (sheriff, state police). Law enforcement verification. Reciprocity verification (interstate). Uses SHA-512 (government ID privacy).
